1.author: Monica Jimenez
1.title: 15 amazing facts about bread
1.description: Bread is one of the few products that people eat every day in different parts of the world. We are so used to this treat that we treat it as something ordinary and even ordinary, and after all, it is he head of everything!

2.author: ANNA PARULAVA
2.title: 600 grams as a reference
2.description: In 1266, a law was passed in England that regulated the mass of bakery products, as well as their cost and payment for the work of bakers. The amazing thing is that it lasted for 600 years!
